title: FTP Misconfiguration Exposure
description: Discover and exploit misconfigured permissions on an FTP server to access sensitive data.
hints: FTP allows anonymous access. Try connecting without credentials.
Look for public files that shouldn't normally be accessible.
Check the home directory of the FTP service for hidden treasures.
learningObjectives: Understand the implications of FTP misconfigurations
Learn to explore FTP directories with read access
Identify and exploit misconfigured file permissions on FTP servers
